subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carolina fans were tickled by a buzzer beater Tuesday night when Jussi Jokinen deflected a slap shot by Dennis Seidenberg past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur with 0.2 seconds left.
snippet: Carolina fans were tickled by a buzzer beater Tuesday night when Jussi Jokinen deflected a slap shot by Dennis Seidenberg past Devils goaltender Martin Brodeur with 0.2 seconds left.
